Title: Allows individuals registered with a non-major political party or registered as independent to serve as election inspectors and poll clerks in certain circumstances
Summary: Allows individuals registered with a non-major political party or registered as independent to serve as election inspectors and poll clerks, so long as such individual makes a declaration of which particular party they intend to work on behalf of.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to allowing individuals registered with a non-major political party or registered as independent to serve as election inspectors and poll clerks in certain circumstances
